Hi,

Thank you Andrew for the reply.
I have already ignored the robot policy in cxml. I have attached the cxml
with this. But still I could not re-create these sites. But in archive.org,
these sites can be seen clearly.
In wayback-1.6, is it looking into old template files, css and apply them
to the newer files automatically?
